name: Sautéed Sheep
description:
The underdwellers attacked the woolly temple during the night, you are now the only sheep left. The god of the wool commands you to go forth,slay all those who desecrated our fellow brothers of the wool, and bring peace to your brethren.

Controls: Move LeftA
Left ArrowMove RightD
Right ArrowJumpSpaceDash
Cooldown indicated by blue mana barLeft ShiftOpen Pause Menu
Close Settings MenuEscape
